sections.name: Basiri, Wellspring Keeper
sections.html: This creature did not include a description.

traits.name: Unique
traits.text: A rules element with this trait is one-of-a-kind. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to creatures with this trait is increased by 10.

traits.name: Evil
traits.text: Evil effects often manipulate energy from evil-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to good divine servants or divine servants of good deities. A creature with this trait is evil in alignment.

traits.name: Aquatic
traits.text: Aquatic creatures are at home underwater. Their bludgeoning and slashing unarmed Strikes don’t take the usual –2 penalty for being underwater. Aquatic creatures can breathe water but not air.

traits.name: Skeleton
traits.text: This undead is made by animating a dead creature’s skeleton with negative energy.

traits.name: Undead
traits.text: Once living, these creatures were infused after death with negative energy and soul-corrupting evil magic. When reduced to 0 Hit Points, an undead creature is destroyed. Undead creatures are damaged by positive energy, are healed by negative energy, and don't benefit from healing effects.

interaction_abilities.name: Bardic Lore
interaction_abilities.text: Sphinxes are naturally curious, and their love of puzzles and mysteries leads them to gather information on a broad range of topics. Sphinxes have the Bardic Lore bard feat, allowing them to Recall Knowledge on any topic.

traits.name: Agile
traits.text: The multiple attack penalty you take with this weapon on the second attack on your turn is –4 instead of –5, and –8 instead of –10 on the third and subsequent attacks in the turn.

ability.name: Aquatic Assault
ability.text: Basiri Swims and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. If both she and her opponent are submerged underwater, she can Strike one additional time.

ability.name: Harness Wellspring
ability.text: Basiri draws upon the necromantic wellspring to power her spellcasting. During her turn, she gains the ability to cast one of the following spells, heightened to 9th level: spirit blast or spirit song.

ability.name: Wellspring Guardian
ability.text: Once per day, Basiri can protect the necromantic wellspring by inscribing a magical sigil around the wellspring orrery. The first time a creature other than Basiri touches the orrery, that creature must succeed at a DC 41 Will save or be affected by spirit blast (9th).
